alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:26AM EST until December 19 at 9:08AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 7.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.7 feet on 05/17/1990. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Saddle River Lodi 5.5 5.3 Mon 5 am EST 3.7 2.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM EST.
